To summarize, we have collections and map.
The collections framework includes both collection-based structures, list, set, queue, and also includes maps.
We're going to use collections when we want to store individual elements.
For instance, we're adding students to a class.
And we're going to use maps when we want to store relationships.
For instance, this student has this particular grade.
This other student has this other grade, and so on.
